newsitem.title: USA: Kansas feedlot cattle Friday roundup - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Kansas feedlot cattle Friday roundup - USDA.

text.p: Trade was slow, with a few sales slaughter steers and heifers steady, USDA said.

Inquiry was good and demand moderate. Sales confirmed on 400 slaughter steers and 500 slaughter heifers Friday. Last week's confirmed sales 93,600 head including 24,900 head or about 27 percent previously contracted or formulated cattle.
Sales FOB feedlot net weights after 4 percent shrink Steers: Few Select and Choice 2-3 1190-1250 lbs 64.00.
Heifers: Few Select and Choice 2-3 1050-1100 lbs 64.00 Confirmed: 900 week ago: 300 year ago: 500
